Plot: Lois is going home after work. She is about to enter the subway tunnel. In the dark, her imagination starts running; she decides to rush back outside and cross the street.
Title: Paranoia
Writer: Rolando Felizola (story), Rolando Felizola, Peter Magat
Actors: Rolando Felizola, Paris Benjamin, Lizbeth Farias, Yeng Li
